trans:
Additional Details
üëâ Winners must confirm their prize through the page's inbox using the same Facebook account that was used to participate in the activity. Provide your full name as stated on your ID card and a contact number. Prize confirmation must be completed by 11th October 2024, before 5:00 p.m. Failure to do so will result in forfeiting the prize.
üëâ Winners can collect event tickets at the event venue by visiting the Dreamy activity booth on Sunday, 13th October 2024, at MCC HALL THE MALL LIFESTORE BANGKAE, starting from 10:00 a.m. Please bring your original ID card or passport and the original receipt for your purchase as proof to collect the tickets.
üëâ To transfer the prize; Notify the page's inbox on Dreamy‚Äôs Facebook page within 1‚Äì3 days after the winners are announced. Failure to notify within this timeframe will result in forfeiting the prize.
üëâ For prize transfers, provide the name of the original prize winner and the name of the transferee. The original receipt must be presented as proof on the day of ticket collection.
